description: Developed self-supervised learning methods improving classification and lesion detection in mammography.
Built a multi-country mammography dataset repository of ~100,000 images for large-scale experimentation.
Designed and trained multimodal vision-language foundation models for breast imaging analysis.
Ranked 4th in the MICCAI ODELIA Challenge 2025 for breast MRI malignancy classification.
Designed reproducible MLOps pipelines using Docker and SLURM for large-scale deep learning.
Conducted clinical validation of a Siemens Healthineers breast MRI AI prototype.
Initiated research projects aimed at improving clinical screening workflows.
Collaborated with radiologists to streamline and improve medical image annotation quality.
Performed clinical validation of mammography AI algorithms in international collaborations (Vietnam cohort).
Contributed to workflow optimization under regulatory and clinical constraints.
Developed deep learning methods for categorizing positioning artifacts in mammography.
Developed MATLAB prototypes for compliance-based task prioritization in clinical workflows.
Evaluated IoT technologies for healthcare workflow optimization.
Co-invented a secure method for unlocking medical devices.
Generated ~25% annual company revenue through QA services across five Indian states.
Led and mentored a biomedical engineering team.
Performed preventive maintenance and compliance testing of medical devices using Fluke biomedical equipment.
